title: Celestial Bloom Chandbali Earrings with Pink Zircon Accents

features: These earrings boast a modern take on the classic Chandbali style, featuring cascading floral-inspired elements adorned with brilliant cubic zirconia. The drops of pink zircon add a touch of delicate color. The setting is meticulously done to maximize light reflection, creating a stunning sparkle.
colors: Primarily silver/white (from the alloy and cubic zirconia) with soft pink accents from the zircon gemstones.

description: These earrings offer a contemporary twist on a traditional Indian design, blending modern aesthetics with timeless elegance. The exquisite craftsmanship and use of high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. The combination of cubic zirconia and pink zircon provides a luxurious look at an accessible price point.
